page.title: 08Farms and Farming.
page.content: The farming land in this area is very mixed, most of it being{grade 2 {Agricultural land. {Summer }work includes concentration on land work and sheep sheering. In{Winter}the farmers are busy doing general repairs and maintaining machinery. There is much feeding of livestock to be done. The quality and numbers of animals has improved with the aid of breeding programmes and the development of medicines. The{Beef cattle, cows}and{sheep}are fed on corn usually saved from the harvest, also hay or straw. The{sheep} also get turnips.{Developments in {machinery}and more{intensive methods over the years have reduced the manpower on farms which is reflected in fewer estate and farm houses being occupied by land workers and a falling role of village school pupils!
